data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Maldonado, Uruguay that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maldonado, Uruguay
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Maldonado. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Maldonado, Uruguay into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 97,316 people in the state of Maldonado who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Piriápolis
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Piriápolis, Maldonado, Uruguay.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Maldonado, Uruguay to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Maldonado, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Maldonado, Uruguay.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

location.cities_list: Maldonado, San Carlos, Punta del Este, Piriápolis, Pan de Azúcar
